description:
API reference:
http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#volume-extension-os-volumes-os-snapshots-deprecated

In os-snapshots APIs, the display name is the snapshot name, not the volume name.
The display description is the snapshot description, not the volume description.
They should be fixed.
title: api-ref: wrong parameters in os-volumes.inc

comments.content:
API reference:
http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/#volume-extension-os-volumes-os-snapshots-deprecated

In os-snapshots APIs, the display name is the snapshot name, not the volume name.
The display description is the snapshot description, not the volume description.
They should be fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/347112/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/347112
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=5e9add3d10dfb272fb88be859673db9e74242c8d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5e9add3d10dfb272fb88be859673db9e74242c8d
Author: Takashi NATSUME <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jul 26 13:20:35 2016 +0900

    api-ref: Fix wrong parameters in os-volumes.inc
    
    In os-snapshots APIs, the display name is the snapshot name,
    not the volume name.
    The display description is the snapshot description,
    not the volume description.
    So fix them.
    
    Change-Id: I33cd59b759c6f7c8eca8bd511ba43637e7b27c1c
    Closes-Bug: #1611292
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 15.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
